/proc/self/io.comment: This will exclude all io specific readings.

/proc/net/dev.comment: This will exclude all network specific readings.

/proc/stat.comment: This will exclude all core-specific readings.

lmsensors.comment: This will include all power readings, if configured with PAPI.

net.comment: This will include only the first ethernet device, if configured with PAPI.

nvml.comment: This will include only the GPU utilization metrics, if configured with PAPI.
